O Minist√©rio P√∫blico do Piau√≠ (MPPI) recomendou √† Prefeitura de Fartura do Piau√≠ , no Sul do estado, o cancelamento do show da banda Calcinha Preta , anunciado para 30 de abril, em comemora√ß√£o ao anivers√°rio da cidade. A recomenda√ß√£o foi expedida nesta quarta-feira (9) e orienta a suspens√£o da contrata√ß√£o da banda Calcinha Preta e qualquer outra atra√ß√£o que represente gasto elevado. De acordo com a promotora Gabriela Almeida de Santana, da 2¬™ Promotoria de Justi√ßa de S√£o Raimundo Nonato, a contrata√ß√£o do evento gerou preocupa√ß√£o diante do atual contexto enfrentado pelo munic√≠pio.
"Fartura do Piau√≠ atravessa s√©rias dificuldades na presta√ß√£o de servi√ßos p√∫blicos essenciais, situa√ß√£o que tem motivado a tramita√ß√£o de diversos procedimentos extrajudiciais voltados √† implementa√ß√£o de pol√≠ticas p√∫blicas para a melhoria das condi√ß√µes de vida da popula√ß√£o", explicou a promotora.

A promotora de Justi√ßa Gabriela Almeida informou, ainda, que recomenda√ß√µes semelhantes ser√£o replicadas aos demais munic√≠pios que tamb√©m est√£o em situa√ß√£o de emerg√™ncia pela estiagem ou seca .
‚ÄúO pr√≥prio prefeito, em entrevista veiculada pela imprensa local, reconheceu os graves impactos da estiagem, relatando que os reservat√≥rios de √°gua est√£o completamente secos e que os pequenos agricultores perderam toda a produ√ß√£o agr√≠cola‚Äù, completou a promotora.
Prefeito da cidade fez apelo em entrevista

No dia 2 de abril, o Governo do Piau√≠ reconheceu emerg√™ncia em 129 munic√≠pios atingidos pela seca. Fartura do Piau√≠ √© um deles. Em entrevista √† TV Clube , o prefeito da cidade, Orlando Costa (PT), fez um apelo e se emocionou ao relatar o drama vivido pela popula√ß√£o. Ele trabalhava como motorista de carro-pipa antes de assumir a gest√£o.

‚ÄúA situa√ß√£o √© ca√≥tica, prec√°ria, lament√°vel. O inverno come√ßa em novembro e, de l√° para c√°, n√£o choveu. O povo procura por √°gua e cesta b√°sica. Os bichos est√£o morrendo de sede. Eu fui pipeiro por v√°rios anos e nunca vi o pequeno agricultor pedir √°gua de carro-pipa para dar aos animais ‚Äù, desabafou o prefeito.
A Secretaria Estadual da Defesa Civil (Sedec) anunciou uma libera√ß√£o de R$ 6 milh√µes para abastecer os moradores dessas cidades com carros-pipas . Al√©m da Opera√ß√£o Carro-Pipa, a Secretaria Estadual da Assist√™ncia Social (Sasc) anunciou que pretende destinar R$ 400 a cada fam√≠lia afetada pela seca nas cidades inclu√≠das no decreto do governo piauiense, totalizando a quantia de R$ 5 milh√µes .

author: Simple
title: Indian Coast Guard Recruitment 2025 Begins For Yantrik & Navik Posts; Apply By June 25
text:
Indian Coast Guard 2025 Application: The Indian Coast Guard has published the recruitment notice for the positions of Yantrik, Navik (General Duty), and Navik (Domestic Branch). Eligible male candidates can apply for the Indian Coast Guard 2025 online at
joinindiancoastguard.cdac.in. The deadline to apply for the India Coast Guard 2025 recruitment exam is June 25.
Indian Coast Guard 2025 Application: Eligibility criteria
For ICG Yantrik:
- Must have passed the 10+2 (Intermediate) examination.
- Physics and Mathematics should be among the subjects studied.
For Navik (Technical):
- Must have passed Class 10.
- Should hold a diploma in Engineering in any one of the following disciplines:
Electrical
Mechanical
Electronics
Telecommunication
Indian Coast Guard 2025 Application: Application fees
Application Fee: ‚Çπ300 for General, OBC, and EWS candidates.
Exemption: No fee for candidates from other categories.
Payment Mode: Online via Net Banking, UPI, Credit Card, or Debit Card.
Indian Coast Guard 2025 Application: Steps to apply
Step 1: Check out
joinindiancoastguard.cdac.in, the official website.
Step 2: To join ICG as enrolled personnel (CGEPT - 02/2025 Batch), click the following link.
Step 3: Create an account by completing your basic information.
Step 4: Enter the login information that was supplied to the registered email address or mobile number.
Step 5: Complete the application by providing the necessary academic, personal, and other details.
Step 6: Provide scanned copies of your signature, photo, and any other required paperwork.
Step 7: If required, pay the application fee.
Step 8: Examine the application and send it in.
Step 9: A copy of the completed form should be downloaded and saved for future use.
Indian Coast Guard 2025: Exam dates
The tentative dates for the Indian Coast Guard's CGEPT-01/2026 recruitment exam are September 2025 and February 2026, respectively. A computer-based exam, a physical fitness test (PFT), document verification, and a medical examination will all be part of the selection process.

title: Adi√≥s a Villa Rica: el de las zapatillas se pasa a las chanclas
text: Secciones Servicios Destacamos Logro√±o Necesitas ser suscriptor para acceder a esta funcionalidad. Viernes, 30 de agosto 2024, 13:58 Necesitas ser suscriptor para acceder a esta funcionalidad. Opciones para compartir Eduardo San Jos√© echar√° ma√±ana s√°bado la persiana del Villa Rica, en la esquina de Laurel con Albornoz, y ser√° para siempre. Por eso, este viernes sus compa√±eros de la Asociaci√≥n de Hosteleros de la Zona Laurel le han querido homenajear. El evento iba a ser tan de sorpresa que el interresado no se ha ido al dentista de milagro. Al final, s√≠ ha recogido la placa en la que le recuerdan cu√°nto les han enamorado sus zapatillas, su gran cl√°sico. Tras los 25 a√±os detr√°s de la barra, a sus 67, Eduardo San Jos√© dice que, desde ahora, habr√° que buscarle en la playa, con su ba√±ador y sus chanclas. De ah√≠ las bromas de sus vecinos de calle sobre ese cambio de las zapatillas por el calzado playero. Los padres del donostiarra Eduardo San Jos√© viv√≠an en Logro√±o y all√≠ por el a√±o 2000 su padre muri√≥, con lo que la frecuencia de sus visitas a la capital riojana aument√≥ para ver a su madre. Un d√≠a vio que se alquilaba la esquina en la que despu√©s ha transcurrido su vida y aqu√≠ se qued√≥. ¬øAntes? Hab√≠a hecho de todo, desde mayorista de fruter√≠a en el mercado central a inaugurar Super Amara e incluso Don Serapio, en San Sebasti√°n. ¬´Siempre cara al p√∫blico¬ª, cuenta √©l, si bien hasta entonces no se hab√≠a puesto detr√°s de la barra. De las zapatillas que tan bien se le han dado, refiere que ya se vend√≠an en el establecimiento antes de su llegada, lo mismo que los matrimonios. En cualquier caso, √©l las has llevado a otro nivel, seg√∫n le reconocen sus compa√±eros de calle. No le es posible hacer n√∫meros respecto a cuantas zapatillas ha llegado a vender. Cuatrocientas, mil, hasta tres mil alg√∫n d√≠a de cohete mateo. La ventaja es que, si la zapatilla la haces bien, gusta a todos los p√∫blicos, comenta este hostelero a punto de dejar de serlo. No pasa igual con la anchoa de los matrimonios, por ejemplo, que a los m√°s peque√±os se les resiste un poco. Durante el acto de entrega de la placa, Adolfo S√°enz, de El Muro, ha recordado los momentos pasados juntos en la calle, muchos buenos, pero tambi√©n algunos muy dif√≠ciles, como los de la pandemia. En principio, el local no tiene qui√©n lo lleve. Si bien si se han pasado distintos interesados, las gestiones no han prosperado, ha contado San Jos√©. De momento. author: PTI
title: Indian Army Engineers Reconnect Sikkim Villages with Speedy Suspension Bridge | Science-Environment
text:
Indian Army Engineers Reconnect Sikkim Villages with Speedy Suspension Bridge Engineers of the Indian Army swiftly built a 150-ft-long suspension bridge over waters in north Sikkim, reconnecting villages cut off by heavy rains. Constructed by the Trishakti Corps, the bridge was completed in under 48 hours, enabling movement and providing relief to the affected locals. PTI | New Delhi | Updated: 23-06-2024 22:44 IST | Created: 23-06-2024 22:44 IST
AI Generated Representative Image Country: India SHARE In a remarkable feat of engineering, Indian Army engineers from the Trishakti Corps have constructed a 150-ft-long suspension bridge to reconnect villages in north Sikkim that were isolated due to heavy rains.
The challenging project, aimed at reconnecting the cut-off areas and providing much-needed relief to the locals, underscores the Army's technical expertise and swift response capabilities.
The bridge, completed in less than 48 hours over rapidly flowing waters, now facilitates the movement of people and the delivery of essential relief materials to the affected areas.
(This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.)

author: Rodrigo Bonilla
title: Guerrero, listo para brillar con la Gala de Pirotecnia A√±o Nuevo 2024 - Noticias de Sinaloa
text:
ACAPULCO, Gro., 28 de diciembre de 2023.- El Gobierno del Estado de Guerrero se prepara para que turistas y residentes reciban el a√±o nuevo 2024 con la espectacular Gala de Pirotecnia Una Luz de Esperanza, con m√°s de 10 mil detonaciones de fuegos pirot√©cnicos y un show de luces con 600 drones y rayos l√°ser que iluminar√°n la Bah√≠a de Acapulco.
De acuerdo con un bolet√≠n, adicionalmente, se incorporar√°n diversos puntos a la programaci√≥n de la Gala de Pirotecnia de A√±o Nuevo 2024, como la Playa Pie de la Cuesta, Playa Puerto Marqu√©s, Playa Bonfil y Playa La Gloria, con la finalidad de brindar a un mayor n√∫mero de personas la oportunidad de disfrutar de este espect√°culo pirot√©cnico.
Tambi√©n los destinos como Ixtapa, San Jer√≥nimo, Papanoa en Tecpan de Galeana, Coyuca de Ben√≠tez, Playa Ventura en Copala, y los Pueblos M√°gicos de Taxco de Alarc√≥n, Zihuatanejo e Ixcateopan de Cuauht√©moc tendr√°n este espect√°culo de Gala de Pirotecnia para recibir el a√±o nuevo.
La nota completa en Quadrat√≠n Guerrero

author: Emilioekpt
title: The Ultimate Guide to English Payment Integration Solutions
text:
In the evolving business environment, an efficient payment integration solution is more than a mere necessity. It's the bridge that connects businesses to their customers, facilitating seamless transactions. Today, we delve into the world of English payment integration solutions, illuminating how they foster business growth, improve customer experiences, and promote overall transactional efficiency.
2. Understanding Payment Integration
Payment integration is the process of incorporating a payment gateway into a business‚Äôs digital platform, be it a website, online store, or mobile app. This integration allows businesses to receive payments directly from customers, paving the way for a smoother, more streamlined e-commerce experience.
3. Why Payment Integration is Crucial for Your Business
In the digital age, having a reliable payment integration solution can be the difference between success and failure. It enhances customer satisfaction by providing a swift, secure, and efficient payment process. Moreover, it reduces the risk of cart abandonment, boosts sales, and contributes significantly to business growth.
4. Key Features of an Excellent Payment Integration Solution
A superior payment integration solution should offer:
‚Ä¢ Security: To protect sensitive information from cyber threats.
‚Ä¢ Compatibility: It should easily integrate with your website or app.
‚Ä¢ Multiple Payment Options: To accommodate customer preferences.
‚Ä¢ Speed: For quick and efficient transactions.
‚Ä¢ Reliable Customer Support: For addressing any technical issues or queries.
5. Top English Payment Integration Solutions
English payment integration solutions have seen rapid advancements in recent years, with several providers offering diverse capabilities. Below, we explore some of the most effective options.
5.1. PayPal
A global leader, PayPal offers a robust payment integration solution with multi-currency support, making it ideal for businesses looking to reach international customers. It provides an intuitive interface, exceptional security measures, and excellent customer support.
5.2. Stripe
Stripe has gained popularity due to its comprehensive API, allowing businesses to customize their payment process extensively. It supports a wide array of payment options and currencies, promoting a seamless customer experience.
5.3. Worldpay
A major player in the UK, Worldpay caters to businesses of all sizes. It's lauded for its robust fraud detection capabilities, diverse payment options, and competitive rates.
6. Advantages of English Payment Integration Solutions
These solutions offer numerous benefits, including:
‚Ä¢ Increased Sales: By offering a smooth, seamless payment process, businesses can significantly boost their conversion rates.
‚Ä¢ Enhanced Security: Top-tier solutions come with state-of-the-art security measures, ensuring safe transactions.
‚Ä¢ Better User Experience: A streamlined payment process improves the overall customer journey, encouraging repeat business.
7. How to Integrate a Payment Gateway
Integrating a payment gateway into your platform typically involves the following steps:
1. Choose a Payment Gateway: Consider your business requirements, customer preferences, and budget.
2. Create a Merchant Account: This account allows you to accept payments.
3. Integration: Use the API or SDK provided by the gateway provider to integrate the payment solution into your platform.
8. Potential Challenges in Payment Integration
While integrating a payment solution, you may face challenges related to security, compatibility, transaction failures, and hidden fees. It's crucial to conduct thorough research, compare various providers, and seek expert advice to avoid potential pitfalls.
9. Future of Payment Integration Solutions
With emerging technologies like AI and blockchain, the future of payment integration solutions looks promising. These technologies can enhance security, speed, and efficiency, fundamentally changing how businesses process payments.
10. Conclusion
English payment integration solutions have revolutionized the business landscape, enabling companies to provide swift, secure, and efficient transaction experiences. By understanding the importance of these solutions, their features, advantages, and potential challenges, businesses can make informed decisions, driving growth and customer satisfaction. The future holds exciting possibilities for payment integration, making it an essential aspect for any business aspiring to thrive in the digital era.
